summary: AN ORDINANCE adopting the compilation and codification of City ordinances of general application as the Official Code of The City of Seattle; repealing Sections 3.20.150, 3.20.160, 3.20.170, 3.20.180, 3.14.520, 3.14.550, 6.22.010,6.78.070, 6.78.090, and 12A.28.080 of the Code, and amending Sections 12A.06.030, 25.04.500, 25.04.550 to correct errors, recodifying Sections 3.22.130 and 3.22.140 as Sections 3.20.090 and 3.20.100; and adopting a new Section 1.04.010 (Severability Clause) for the Code.
